name: OurAbilityConnect
0:
”Alexa, start Our Ability Connect.”
”I'm not sure I can do a job you recommended.”
”Will you help me figure out what job would be best for me?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: our ability connect
Developer Terms of Use
des: Our voice app lets you learn more about our organization. Ask frequently asked questions about us and the voice assistant will happily answer them.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
